verbose_text: These effects have shown to benefit bone tissue formation both by inhibiting osteoclastogenesis through blocking the mavelonate pathway 19 and by stimulating osteoblastic activity through the increase in the expression of bone morphogenic protein (BMP2) 17, vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) 20 and alkaline phosphatase XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
